original_title: Queens of Columbus: Performance and the Art of Illusion
overview: A fast-paced documentary that explores female impersonation in a large Midwestern city. Comprised of interviews with nine female illusionists, "Queens" utilizes performance footage and excerpts from other gay-focused events, such as Ohio's largest gay pride parade and "Bat'n'Rouge", a drag queen softball game.
title: Queens of Columbus: Performance and the Art of Illusion
